name: Archer 2 (C64)
description:
Heavily inspired by Die Hard, Archer 2 takes place in a multi story office building overrun with terrorists! This time there are no bombs to diffuse, but there are a few to set off, and lots of hidden hamburgers to find to restore your health!

(No instructions)

Made with Gary Kitchen's Game Maker.

This game is in D64 format and is meant to be run in a Commodore 64 emulator
